articles.title: ICMR creates eco-friendly technology to kill mosquitoes - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: The World Health Organization (WHO) estimates that vector-borne illnesses account for more than 17% of all infectious diseases, killing over 700,000 people each year. They can be brought on by parasites, bacteria, or viruses.

articles.description: Last week, rumours circulated that Lee was facing fines for not being able to produce evidence of Wang’s infidelities. She has posted a legal letter refuting this.
articles.content:
